meanings.definition: To make erotic or sexually stimulating.
meanings.sent1: The romantic music erotizes the atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent2: The steamy scenes in the movie erotizes the audience.
meanings.sent3: The playful flirtation between the two friends erotizes their usual conversations.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the painting erotizes the viewer's senses.
meanings.sent5: The warm candlelight erotizes the dinner setting.

meanings.definition: To imbue with sexual desire or attraction.
meanings.sent1: The perfume she wore erotizes him instantly.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious stranger's gaze erotizes her thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The tempting aroma of freshly baked cookies erotizes the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The enchanting melody of the song erotizes memories of young love.
meanings.sent5: The alluring smile of the model erotizes the magazine cover.
